description: The initiative focuses on urban agriculture, promoting professional integration and sustainability through a unique farm model. Established in 2015, it operates on a water reservoir site in Paris, emphasizing social value alongside agricultural production. The farm engages in horticultural activities, educational programs for local schools, and corporate events, fostering community connections. With a commitment to organic practices, it aims to enhance biodiversity while providing job training and support for individuals seeking reintegration into the workforce.
name: Le Paysan Urbain
